verses.content: Chun, luong, hmawl ang hi pêkin ka um a, chuongchun, tûin amanih, “Tho la, Pathien biekin le mâichâm chu inkhi la, a sûnga betuhai khawm tiem rawh.
Biekin puotienga inhuonna sûng tuollai ruok chu inkhi sa naw, chu chu Jentailhai kuoma pêk a ni ta sih a; anni chun khaw Inthieng chu thla sawmli pahni sir dêng an tih.
Chun, ka thu hretu pahnihai kuoma chun thu pêng ka ta, chuongchun, saiip puon silin ni sâng khat za hni sâwmruk sûng po thu hril an tih,” a ta.
Chuong chu Oliv thing pahni le khâwnvar siena pahni, khawvêl Lal hmaa ngîrhai chu an nih.
Anni chu tûkhawmin suknat an tum chun, an baua inthawkin mei a hung suok a, an hmêlmahai chu a kânghmang hlak. Tûkhawmin anni chu suknat tum ang sienla, chuong ang bawka sukhlumin an um ding a nih.

Chuonghai chun an thu hril sûng po ruo sûr naw dinga vân sukping theina an nei a; an nuom pha phaa thisena inchangtir dingin tuihai chungah thu an nei a, khawvêl hi hremna tinrênga hrem dingin thu an nei bawk a.
Chun, an inhriettirna thu chu an hril zo phaa vânsama inthawka Sahrâng hung suok ding chun anni do a ta, hnêng a ta, sukhlum a tih.
Chun, an ruong chu khaw ropui kawtthlêra chun um zing a ta; chu khaw ropui chu thlarau tieng thua chu Sodom le Aigupta an ti a nih, chutaka bawk chun an Lalpa chu hemdein a um kha.
Chun, mihai laia mi dâm, chihai laia mi dâm, ṭawnghai laia mi dâm, hnamhai laia mi dâmin ni thum le a chenve an ruong chu en an ta, an ruonghai chu thlâna phûm phal naw ni hai.
An thi leiin hnuoia umhai chu lâwm an ta, hlimna siem an ta, thilpêkhai inthawn tuo bawk an tih; zâwlnei pahni hai chun hnuoia umhai chu an sukrimsik hlak leiin.
Chun, ni thum le a chenve hnunga chun Pathien kuoma in- thawka hringna thuok an sûngah a hung lût a, an kein an ngîr tah a, chuongchun, a hmutuhai chun an ṭi ta bêk bêk a.
Chun, an kuomah, “Hitaka hin hung ro,” tiin vâna inthawkin rawl inringtak an hriet a. Chuongchun, sûm lai chun vânah an hang fe tah a; an hmêlmahai chun an hmu zing a.

Chun, chu lai tak chun sim- khawleihnuoi nasatakin a hung inhnîng a, khuo chu hmun sâwma ṭhea hmun khat a chim tah a, simkhawleihnuoi inhnînga chun mi sâng sari an thih a; a danghai chun an ṭih a, vân Pathien chu an chawimawi tah a.
Chungrikna pahnina chu a bo tah a, ngai ta, chungrikna pathumna chu a hung um vak ding a nih.

Chun, vântirko pasarina chun a hang mût a, chuongchun, “Khawvêl ram chu ei Lalpa le a Krista ram a hung ni tah, ama chun chatuonin ro rêl a tih,” tiin vâna chun rawl inringtakin a hung suok nghâl tah a.
Chuongchun, Pathien hmaa an lalṭhungphaa upa sâwmhni le pali ṭhunghai chu an bawkkhup a, Pathien chibai an bûk a.
“Aw Lalpa Pathien, Iengkim- thawthei, um zing le um tah, i thilthawtheina ropuitak chu laa ro i rêl leiin lâwmthu kan hril che.

Hnamhai chu an lunginsen a, chun, i lunginsenna chu a hung tlung ve thung a, mithi rorêlpêk hun le, i suok zâwlneihai kuoma dâm, mi in- thienghai kuoma dâm, i hming inza mi lien le mi chînhai kuoma dâm, an lâwmman pêk hun le, hnuoi sukse- tuhai suksiet ve thung hun chu a hung tlung bawk a,” tiin.

Chun, vâna Pathien biekin chu ân hawng a, chuongchun, biekina chun a thuthlungna bâwm chu a hung inlang tah a; chun kâwlinlep dâm, rawl dâm, vân inrûm dâm, simkhawleihnuoi inhnîng dâm, riel nasatak dâm, a hung um nghâl tah a.
